Title: Getting Started with Vagrant and Phalcon
Description:
Here's a visual walkthrough for vagrant-phalcon.

From the README.md:

Getting Started

  1. Download and install VirtualBox
  2. Download and install Vagrant
  3. Clone this repo
  4. Run vagrant up in the repo directory
  5. Visit http://localhost:8081/ in your favorite browser

Take a look a my post, Vagrant is Awesome, for more.
